retoric accent so hard sounds like hard

it makes sense that accents in countries

roric like this
one and the way you talk can carry

Education ethnicity and socioeconomic
status it's not always accurate but it
can affect people's perceptions one
study at the University of Chicago
looked at the effects that accents have
on
credibility when a person with an accent
made a factual statement say a giraffe
can go without water longer than a camel
can people were less likely to believe
it was true and the heavier the accent
the less believable they would perceive
to be another study in the UK found that
people were more likely to rate a
suspect as guilty if they had a regional
accent compared to a London accent come
to think of it a lot of bad guys in

that's the Rhythm stress and intonation
